video.title: Blue Mountain State
video.synopsis: Follow the misadventures of three freshmen -- quarterback Alex, running back Craig and mascot Sammy -- at gridiron powerhouse Blue Mountain State.

episodes.synopsis: Three incoming freshmen at football powerhouse Blue Mountain State University must quickly adapt to college life, juggling football, girls and hazing.
episodes.title: It's Called Hazing, Look It Up

episodes.synopsis: The team throws Craig a promise ring bachelor party, and the next morning he notices his ring is gone.
episodes.title: Promise Ring

episodes.synopsis: Thad brags that he doesn't need a girl because he already has an adequate sex toy.
episodes.title: Pocket P*ssy

episodes.synopsis: Billy the goat mascot and Sammy are kidnapped by a rival school.
episodes.title: Rivalry Weekend

episodes.synopsis: After too much slacking, Alex gets demoted to third string. He is ecstatic at first, but then realizes that the third stringers are a bunch of freaks.
episodes.title: There's Only One Second Best

episodes.synopsis: After losing two games in a row, the team participates in a Drug Olympics to exorcise their demons.
episodes.title: Drug Olympics

episodes.synopsis: Recruitment week starts at BMS, and Alex tries to get the top quarterback recruit, Golden Arm, to commit to BMS so Alex won't ever have to start.
episodes.title: The Legend of Golden Arm

episodes.synopsis: Alex unknowingly breaks a years-long truce between the football and lacrosse teams by hooking up with a lacrosse player's girl, igniting a team war.
episodes.title: LAX

episodes.synopsis: Alex, Thad and some other players learn that they are failing and have to pass an upcoming test so they don't lose their eligibility.
episodes.title: Midterms

episodes.synopsis: Sammy, Alex and Craig participate (along with the rest of the school) in the Marathon Monday tradition of drinking for a full 24 hours.
episodes.title: Marathon Monday

episodes.synopsis: Alex gets fan mail from a guy who wants Alex to date his daughter.
episodes.title: Ransom

episodes.synopsis: The team finds out that they have to be drug tested, so they try to stay sober for three days but can't function normally.
episodes.title: Piss Test

episodes.synopsis: When the team heads to Louisiana for their bowl game, Thad warns them about the other team's sabotage tactics, from food poisoning to cheerleaders.
episodes.title: Bowl Game

episodes.synopsis: After being sodomized in a fumble pile during practice, Thad determines to learn who violated him, but encounters conflicting versions of the story.
episodes.title: The Fingering

episodes.synopsis: To improve the team, Coach Daniels brings in a new star QB, who drags Alex into increasingly dangerous adventures. Meanwhile, Sammy's sister arrives.
episodes.title: Controversy

episodes.synopsis: The team's decision to stay celibate to energize their performance on the field backfires when Mary Jo, out of frustration, stirs them into a frenzy.
episodes.title: Born Again

episodes.synopsis: The team begins accepting increasingly ostentatious gifts from agents, while Daniels fends off pressures to play the annoying son of a local booster.
episodes.title: Pay for Play

episodes.synopsis: Alex and Thad each receive messages from a woman saying she is pregnant, but respond very differently. Sammy wonders if he should stay with Mary Jo.
episodes.title: Pregnant

episodes.synopsis: The campus nerds revolt, leaving the jocks unable to function academically and causing an identity crisis in Sammy.
episodes.title: Nerds

episodes.synopsis: Alex unwittingly sleeps with Daniels' ex-wife and winds up a pawn in their bitter relationship. Sammy struggles to end Mary Jo's latest obsession.
episodes.title: Debra

episodes.synopsis: After the campus is vacated, Thad goes on a vision quest to help him decide between staying at BMS next year and going pro.
episodes.title: Vision Quest

episodes.synopsis: During rivalry weekend, when  Overland's mascot gets loose, Alex and Thad set out to find it so Alex can tailgate and Thad can find his own enjoyment.
episodes.title: The Badger

episodes.synopsis: Alex becomes backup goalie for the hockey team, thinking it's the perfect way to avoid conditioning, while Mary Jo becomes Thad's private cheerleader.
episodes.title: Hockey

episodes.synopsis: Confined to the local drunk tank, Alex and his pals must stay until they're sober as Sammy tries to get drunk enough to join them and break them out.
episodes.title: Drunk Tank

episodes.synopsis: The team is a game away from an undefeated season, but confidence slips when Radon is tackled by Thad. Meanwhile, Coach Daniels has a heart attack.
episodes.title: Trap Game

episodes.synopsis: When a riot breaks out after the team's undefeated season ends, Alex and his teammates must cross the frenzied campus to save Sammy from rabid fans.
episodes.title: Riot

episodes.synopsis: While Alex adjusts to becoming the starting quarterback and team captain, Thad awaits word on his future with the team after his drug-related arrest.
episodes.title: The Captain

episodes.synopsis: Alex and Thad deal with the ramifications of a pornographic photo that Thad sent from Alex's phone after it makes its way around campus.
episodes.title: Dic Pics

episodes.synopsis: Alex takes on Thad's persona as he struggles to pull Thad out of a post-suspension slump.
episodes.title: Thad's Back

episodes.synopsis: Alex and Sammy have a falling out when Alex plays the best game of his career and accepts it as the peak of his life.
episodes.title: The Peak

episodes.synopsis: Thad offers to teach Alex what it's like to be a local celebrity, but he has ulterior motives.
episodes.title: Training Day

episodes.synopsis: A blackout on campus postpones the next day's game against Buckingham. Alex uses it as a chance to get revenge on one of Buckingham's cheerleaders.
episodes.title: Blackout

episodes.synopsis: When his pre-game rituals start to betray his game-time performance, Harmon looks for new superstitions that will restore his kicking abilities.
episodes.title: Superstition

episodes.synopsis: As Coach Daniels prepares to be inducted into the College Hall of Fame, Thad comes to terms with some troubling secrets from Daniels's past.
episodes.title: Fun Facts

episodes.synopsis: Thad's behavior takes a turn for the worse after he suffers a concussion, making it difficult for Daniels to hide the injury from Gilday and the NCAA.
episodes.title: The C-Word

episodes.synopsis: A documentary television series is filming at BMS, following the team and its coaches both on and off the field.
episodes.title: One Week

episodes.synopsis: BMS rejoices when they find out they will be playing Blackwell for the bowl championship.
episodes.title: Death Penalty

episodes.synopsis: BMS loses the bowl game to Blackwell when their starters are benched from play due to breaking NCAA rules.
episodes.title: The Corn Field: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The battle continues as the BMS and Blackwell teams fight it out on the corn field for bragging rights as to who the real champion is.
episodes.title: The Corn Field: Part 2
